basic.floral_language:
Torenia fournieri 
Floriography: youthful, gentle, wisdom
Torenia fournieri has yellow-green leaves in oval shape with regularly toothed edges, exquisite small flowers with rich colors, like horns, lovely with high ornamental value, often used to decorate a balcony, backyard, or hung like a spider plant in pot. 
Torenia fournieri likes sunny environments with half shade tolerance. Flowering in June-August for 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period June-August, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, in summer and autumn apply fertilizers once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
